meanings: weaken, grow weak [feeble], be enfeebled, fall in health, abate (바람이), wane(빛·힘·명성이).

vlive.korean: 내가 약해진 건가? Does it mean that I'm weaker now? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: Does it mean that I'm weaker now?

vlive.korean: 모발 노화와 약해진 두피를 탱탱하게 케어해줄 거예요! It will help your aged hair and flaky scalp. 듣기 View video SEOUL EONNI : 부시시한 곱슬 건조한 손상 머리 관리법은? 순한샴푸? (๑˃̵ᴗ˂̵๑) 머리에 꿀발랐어~honey
vlive.english: It will help your aged hair and flaky scalp.

vlive.korean: 잠깐만 나 이렇게 약해진 거 실화? One second! Is it real I became weak? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Special] '음주 歌 마무' 시즌 3 Free style
vlive.english: One second! Is it real I became weak?

vlive.korean: [생생한 증언에 마음 약해진 크루들] 뭐 우리한테 딜을 할 수도 있는 거고. and we can give him deals. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 김재중 스페셜 Ep.6
vlive.english: and we can give him deals.

vlive.korean: [6모 씨 (박우재)] 몸도 마음도 많이 약해진 상태죠... His body and mind is very weak right now. 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #76 (2018 MMA 비하인드)
vlive.english: His body and mind is very weak right now.

examples.korean: I just feel very weak these days. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그냥 요즘 들어 몸이 많이 약해진 것 같애. Neungyule
examples.english: I just feel very weak these days. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My son here has been feeling weak. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여기 제 아들이 요즘 몸이 약해진 것 같아요. Neungyule
examples.english: My son here has been feeling weak. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Gradually, the weakened heart quits pumping properly, leading to deadly heart failure. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 약해진 심장은 서서히 박동을 멈추면서 치명적인 심장마비에 이르게 된다. Neungyule
examples.english: Gradually, the weakened heart quits pumping properly, leading to deadly heart failure. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don't feel very well these days. I feel kind of weak. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 요즘 컨디션이 별로 좋진 않아. 몸이 약해진 것 같아. Neungyule
examples.english: I don't feel very well these days. I feel kind of weak. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She stood up[managed to stand up], barely supported by her weakened legs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 약해진 두 다리로 간신히 버티고 섰다 Neungyule
examples.english: She stood up[managed to stand up], barely supported by her weakened legs. Add to Wordbook
